caller_intent: The caller seeks advice on adjusting insurance coverage for their older vehicles, specifically whether to keep full coverage or switch to liability, while expressing a preference to invest in a house rather than replace cars.
resolution_steps: Heather confirms the caller's policy details (three vehicles, including a 2011 Toyota Rav4, 2012 Toyota Highlander, and 2014 Honda Accord).
Heather advises keeping comprehensive coverage but removing collision coverage for the older vehicles (2011 and 2012 models) due to their age and diminishing value.
Heather reassures the caller that National General will email the ID card for the refund process.
Heather acknowledges the caller's long-term relationship with the agency and confirms the policy change has been processed.
knowledge_required: Understanding of insurance coverage types (liability, full coverage, comprehensive, collision).
Knowledge of vehicle depreciation and its impact on coverage recommendations.
Familiarity with National General's claim/ID card distribution process.
systems_referenced: Email system for ID card distribution
summary: Heather advises a caller on adjusting insurance coverage for their older vehicles, recommending comprehensive but not collision coverage due to vehicle age. The caller agrees and confirms they will keep the vehicles long-term. Heather also confirms National General will email the ID card for a refund. The call concludes with mutual agreement on the policy adjustments.
